text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days have gone by since the<n>tryouts, and I can't help
but worry<n>about Daiwa Scarlet. If I could just<n>talk to her
one more time...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I head out to look for her, but by the<n>time I find her, she's
already<n>surrounded by plenty of other<n>trainers.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
The way the tryouts ended was<n>certainly regrettable, but
you too have<n>what it takes to win a G1!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ..."You too?"

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I've got a plan all laid out! Instead of<n>flying out the gate, you
could save<n>your energy for the end. That way,<n>just like
Vodka, you can w—

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: "Just like"... Is that right?

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: U-ummm...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sorry, but are we finished here?<n>...Excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet promptly leaves the<n>scene, sporting a rather
intimidating<n>smile.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm. I heard that she was an<n>exemplary honor student,
but isn't<n>she quite temperamental?

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That attitude is a pass for me... She<n>might have the talent,
but even that<n>only goes so far.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: For now, I need to go after Daiwa<n>Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's all the commotion<n>about?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Aughhh! You don't needa stick to me<n>all day! I told you,
gimme some time to<n>think!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You say that, but you keep on running<n>away! Vodka, come
join my team!<n>I've already made arrangements for<n>you to
go overseas!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I get it, I really do! So leave me alone<n>for a bit, would ya?!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Hey... Wait up, Vodka! I'm not givingup! I will make you the numberone racer!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Number one...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Ugh.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ...Finally found you, Daiwa Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh? A-Air Groove?! Um, did you<n>need something from me?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: A warning.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I've come to warn you in my capacity<n>as vice president.
Daiwa Scarlet,<n>recently, you've been sneaking out<n>of the
dorm every night, haven't you?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Uh... A-about that...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Breaking curfew to go out at night<n>without applying for
permission<n>beforehand is inexcusable.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
An honor student like you should<n>know that by heart, Daiwa
Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yes, ma'am. Please accept... my<n>sincerest apologies.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Good grief...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You were out running, weren't you?<n>A considerable amount
every night,<n>too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Um... H-how did you know that?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: I can easily tell by your expression<n>and gait.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure you know this, but you're<n>overworking yourself.
You should stop<n>before you injure yourself or<n>something
worse happens.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: But I...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I... came in second. Even though Iwas aiming to be number one. Eventhough I had to be number one!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Every runner experiences it—the<n>moment when their knees
hit the turf.<n>Words of wisdom from my mother.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
What's important is how you stand<n>up and recover. Failure
is not<n>something to be feared.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But, this has never happened before!<n>I was always number
one! I put my all<n>into making sure that would stay the<n>
same!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: ...Air Groove. I'm being ridiculous...<n>aren't I?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
It's laughable, isn't it? Just because<n>I was a little faster
than the<n>competition back home, I acted like I<n>was number
one—like I was<n>something... Not to mention this whole<n>
honor student bit.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But you know, when I finally got to<n>Tracen Academy... I
easily lost to<n>opponents like Vodka—opponents<n>who were
the real deal.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: In reality... Becoming "number one"?<n>I'm just not cut out—

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Silence. Don't you dare finish that<n>sentence.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You won't be able to take those<n>words back.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: S-sorry. I...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What should I do?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I... I don't know what to do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet continues muttering to<n>herself again and
again, clearly<n>frustrated.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: If only there was something I could<n>do for her...
